Header: New Director Quality Assurance Takes Office
Content: Brigadier Deepal Wanniarachchi of Sri Lanka Signal Corps (SLSC) assumed office as the 4th Director of the Directorate of Quality Assurance this morning (4) at the Army Headquarters. He symbolized the acceptance of office by leaving his signature for an official document amid religious observances. Staff Officers of the Directorate and Other Ranks were at the venue. He was the Commandant at the Army Logistic School at Trincomalee before this appointment.
